tech: Python, Streamlit, Data Model, Data Analysis

node.html: Performed comprehensive data wrangling, EDA, and relational data modeling for e-commerce datasets, enhancing data quality and business analysis. Created interactive dashboards using Streamlit to visualize sales, customer segmentation, and key business metrics for actionable insights.

SmartStay is a project designed to efficiently manage guest bookings, room availability, and reservations while implementing dynamic pricing strategies. It uses Python, MySQL, and email automation to optimize pricing based on demand, occupancy, and customer preferences, enhancing profitability.

This project analyzes market basket analysis using the Apriori, ECLAT, and FPGrowth algorithms, comparing their performance on retail transaction data to evaluate computational efficiency and the quality of generated association rules. The study highlights FPGrowth as the fastest algorithm and Apriori as producing the most comprehensive rules, offering insights into choosing suitable algorithms for market basket analysis.
